onyomiExamples.meaning: stockpile, reserves, storing, stocking up, laying in (supplies)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to furnish with, to equip with, to provide, to install, to prepare for, to make preparations for, to make provision for, to possess (all that is needed), to be endowed with, to be equipped with, to be born with, to have since birth
to be furnished with, to be provided with, to be equipped with, to be possessed of, to be endowed with, to be gifted with, to be among, to be one of
in detail, with great care, completely, fully
